Warrior.description: A master of melee combat, built for war.

Mage.description: A wielder of Veil or Breath magic, bending reality.

Rogue.description: A shadow in the empire, striking unseen.

Cleric.description: A conduit of the Breath, healing and smiting.

Paladin.description: A holy warrior, champion of the Breath.

Outlaw_Mercenary_Warrior.description: Rugged warrior from outlaw roots, mercenary for hire—brutal in melee, resilient, with intimidation edge.

Ogre_Brute.description: Massive powerhouse wielding improvised weapons like grizzly swipes—devastating hits, but slow and exhausting.

grab_rip.desc: Grab and attempt to tear limb (2-round process).

heavy_throw.desc: Throw heavy object as projectile (high damage/stun).

bear_mass.desc: Ignore 1 arm cripple for improvised use.

Ogre Ravager.description: Brutal melee destroyer driven by hunger, tearing foes apart in grimdark frenzy.

flesh_rend.description: Enhanced grab_rip with devour heal on rip success.

gluttons_vitality.description: Recover stamina/health after rip/smash, +bleeding to grabbed, corruption penalty.

devour_charge.description: Throw + bonus attack, with self-stun risk.

Ogre Behemoth.description: Immovable tank absorbing punishment, guarding in a world of endless pain.

unyielding_bulk.description: Boost mass penalty/stun, reduce incoming damage.

earthquake_slam.description: AOE slam on grapple, stun multiple foes.

flesh_shield.description: Use grabbed as shield/club for defense/damage.

Ogre Flesh Eater.description: Corrupted healer consuming foes for regeneration in a starving world.

regenerative_feast.description: Regen on kill, +bleeding to grabbed, corruption penalty.

voracious_grasp.description: Auto-rip on grab with high heal/self-stun risk.

Ogre Stormbreaker.description: Siege specialist destroying defenses in a crumbling world.

armor_crusher.description: Boost penetration/durability damage, ignore armor on throws.

rampage_grip.description: Chain rip + slam AOE, with recoil risk.
